overview: Ruben, the CEO and founder of LadyTravels.com, began working with online dating startups back in 2003. As a graduate of The University of Southern California with a degree in Business,Ruben has worked tirelessly on many web concepts that eventually culminated in LadyTravels.com. Ruben realizes that the dating landscape is changing. With his innovative vision and his staff of experts, he aims to bring a new, fun twist to both dating and traveling.
